Name: Charging Arm: Bobbing
Desc:
Evades enemy attacks and moves forward. You can stop immediately by using the Jump key. Using a custom command allows you to reuse the skill to stop it immediately.
Can be chained with Magnum Drive, Magnum Rush, or Burning Breaker.
It can be charged by holding the key down, and when activated after charging, using a different skill cancels the skill and activates Ducking. Charging is possible while using skills other than Ducking, and up to 2 skills can be charged at once. Also permanently increases damage dealt by Magnum Drive.
Custom command On/Off: Right-click
Required skill: Magnum Drive Lv. 20 or above
Lv. 15 Effect: Can learn 3rd Job Skill "Charging Arm: Weaving".
